description.value:
Requirements You just used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action.

Area @Template[type:burst|distance:15]

You fill your allies with a contagious, electrical fervor. You and each ally within the burst immediately restore one Focus Point, if they possess one, and each ally within the emanation regains one daily use of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action before becoming immune to future versions of Fury Brand's effects.

You may choose one ally. That ally may @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} on their next turn, even if their prerequisites for the Limit Break activity are not met.
